Neuropsychiatric Inventory

Source: R/data.R
NPI.Rd

Neuropsychiatric Inventory data. More information is available at https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Usage

data(NPI)

Format

A data frame with 7734 observations and 169 variables.

Source

https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Details

  • ORIGPROT character Original study protocol , with options: ADNI1, ADNI2, ADNIGO, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • COLPROT factor Study protocol of data collection , with factor levels: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • PTID character Participant ID

  • RID numeric Participant roster ID Range value: 2, ..., 10592

  • VISCODE character Visit code

  • VISCODE2 character Translated visit code

  • EXAMDATE Examination Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • NPISOURC character Information source

    • ADNI2: 1=Participant visit; 2=Telephone call

    • ADNI3: 1=Participant visit;2=Telephone call/Video Call

    • ADNI4: 1=Participant visit; 2=Telephone call/Video Call

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • SPID numeric Study Partner ID: Range value: 1, ..., 10

  • NPIA character A. Delusions

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA1 character 1. Does P believe that he/she is in danger - that others are planning to hurt him/her?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA2 character 2. Does P believe that others are stealing from him/her?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA3 character 3. Does P believe that his/her spouse is having an affair?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA4 character 4. Does P believe that unwelcome guests are living in his/her house?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA5 character 5. Does P believe that his/her spouse or others are not who they claim to be?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA6 character 6. Does P believe that his/her house is not his/her home?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA7 character 7. Does P believe that family members plan to abandon him/her?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA8 character 8. Does P believe that television or magazine figures are actually present in the home? [Does he/she try to talk to or interact with them?]

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA9 character 9. Does P believe any other unusual things that I haven't asked about?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA10A character 10a. Frequency Ratings

    • ADNI2: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Occasionally;2=2: Often;3=3: Frequently;4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI4: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA10B character 10b. Severity Ratings

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 1=1: Mild; 2=2: Moderate; 3=3: Marked

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Mild;2=2: Moderate;3=3: Marked

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIA10C character 10c. Caregiver Distress

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=Not at all; 1=Minimally; 2=Mildly; 3=Moderately; 4=Severely; 5=Very severely or extremely

    • ADNI3: 0=Not at all;1=Minimally;2=Mildly;3=Moderately;4=Severely;5=Very severely or extremely

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIATOT numeric A. Delusions: Item score

    • ADNI2, ADNI3: 0..12

    • ADNI4

  • NPIB character B. Hallucinations

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB1 character 1. Does P describe hearing voices or act as if he/she hears voices?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB2 character 2. Does P talk to people who are not there?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB3 character 3. Does P describe seeing things not seen by others or behave as if he/she is seeing things not seen by others (people, animals, lights, etc.)?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB4 character 4. Does P report smelling odors not smelled by others?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB5 character 5. Does P describe feeling things on his/her skin or otherwise appear to be feeling things crawling or touching him/her?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB6 character 6. Does P describe tastes that are without any known cause?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB7 character 7. Does P describe any other unusual sensory experiences?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB8A character 8a. Frequency Ratings

    • ADNI2: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Occasionally;2=2: Often;3=3: Frequently;4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI4: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB8B character 8b. Severity Ratings

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 1=1: Mild; 2=2: Moderate; 3=3: Marked

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Mild;2=2: Moderate;3=3: Marked

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIB8C character 8c. Caregiver Distress

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=Not at all; 1=Minimally; 2=Mildly; 3=Moderately; 4=Severely; 5=Very severely or extremely

    • ADNI3: 0=Not at all;1=Minimally;2=Mildly;3=Moderately;4=Severely;5=Very severely or extremely

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIBTOT numeric B. Hallucinations: Item score

    • ADNI2, ADNI3: 0..12

    • ADNI4

  • NPIC character C: Agitation/Aggression

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC1 character 1. Does P get upset with those trying to care for him/her or resist activities such as bathing or changing clothes?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC2 character 2. Is P stubborn, having to have things his/her way?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC3 character 3. Is P uncooperative, resistive to help from others?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC4 character 4. Does P have any other behaviors that make him/her hard to handle?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC5 character 5. Does P shout or curse angrily?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC6 character 6. Does P slam doors, kick furniture, throw things?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC7 character 7. Does P attempt to hurt or hit others?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC8 character 8. Does P have any other aggressive or agitated behaviors?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC9A character 9a. Frequency Ratings

    • ADNI2: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Occasionally;2=2: Often;3=3: Frequently;4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI4: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC9B character 9b. Severity Ratings

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 1=1: Mild; 2=2: Moderate; 3=3: Marked

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Mild;2=2: Moderate;3=3: Marked

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIC9C character 9c. Caregiver Distress

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=Not at all; 1=Minimally; 2=Mildly; 3=Moderately; 4=Severely; 5=Very severely or extremely

    • ADNI3: 0=Not at all;1=Minimally;2=Mildly;3=Moderately;4=Severely;5=Very severely or extremely

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPICTOT numeric C. Agitation/Aggression: Item score

    • ADNI2, ADNI3: 0..12

    • ADNI4

  • NPID character D: Depression/Dysphoria

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID1 character 1. Does P have periods of tearfulness or sobbing that seem to indicate sadness?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID2 character 2. Does P say or act as if he/she is sad or low in spirits?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID3 character 3. Does P put him/herself down or say that he/she feels like a failure?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID4 character 4. Does P say that he/she is a bad person or deserves to be punished?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID5 character 5. Does P seem very discouraged or say that he/ she has not future?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID6 character 6. Does P say he/she is a burden to the family or that the family would be better off without him/her?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID7 character 7. Does P express a wish for death or talk about killing him/herself?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID8 character 8. Does P show any other signs of depression or sadness?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID9A character 9a. Frequency Ratings

    • ADNI2: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Occasionally;2=2: Often;3=3: Frequently;4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI4: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID9B character 9b. Severity Ratings

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 1=1: Mild; 2=2: Moderate; 3=3: Marked

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Mild;2=2: Moderate;3=3: Marked

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPID9C character 9c. Caregiver Distress

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=Not at all; 1=Minimally; 2=Mildly; 3=Moderately; 4=Severely; 5=Very severely or extremely

    • ADNI3: 0=Not at all;1=Minimally;2=Mildly;3=Moderately;4=Severely;5=Very severely or extremely

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIDTOT numeric D. Depression/Dysphoria: Item score

    • ADNI2, ADNI3: 0..12

    • ADNI4

  • NPIE character E. Anxiety

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE1 character 1. Does P say that he/she is worried about planned events?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE2 character 2. Does P have periods of feeling shaky, unable to relax, or feeling excessively tense?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE3 character 3. Does P have periods of [or complain of] shortness of breath, gasping, or sighing for no apparent reason other than nervousness?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE4 character 4. Does P complain of butterflies in his/her stomach, or of racing or pounding of the heart in association with nervousness? [Symptoms not explained by ill health]?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE5 character 5. Does P avoid certain places or situations that make him.her more nervous such as riding in the car, meeting with friends, or being in crowds?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE6 character 6. Does P become nervous or upset when separated from you [or his/her caregiver]? [Does he/she cling to you to keep from being separated?]

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE7 character 7. Does P show any other signs of anxiety?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE8A character 8a. Frequency Ratings

    • ADNI2: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Occasionally;2=2: Often;3=3: Frequently;4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI4: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE8B character 8b. Severity Ratings

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 1=1: Mild; 2=2: Moderate; 3=3: Marked

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Mild;2=2: Moderate;3=3: Marked

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIE8C character 8c. Caregiver Distress

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=Not at all; 1=Minimally; 2=Mildly; 3=Moderately; 4=Severely; 5=Very severely or extremely

    • ADNI3: 0=Not at all;1=Minimally;2=Mildly;3=Moderately;4=Severely;5=Very severely or extremely

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIETOT numeric E. Anxiety: Item score

    • ADNI2, ADNI3: 0..12

    • ADNI4

  • NPIF character F. Elation/Euphoria

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF1 character 1. Does P appear to feel too good or too happy, different from his/her usual self?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF2 character 2. Does P find humor and laugh at things that others do not find funny?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF3 character 3. Does P seem to have a childish sense of humor with a tendency to giggle or laugh inappropriately (such as when something unfortunate happens to others)?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF4 character 4. Does P tell jokes or make remarks that have little humor for others but seem funny to him/her?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF5 character 5. Does he/she play childish pranks such as pinching or playing "keep away" for the fun of it?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF6 character 6. Does P "talk big" or claim to have more abilities or wealth than is true?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF7 character 7. Does P show any other signs of feeling too good or being too happy?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF8A character 8a. Frequency Ratings

    • ADNI2: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Occasionally;2=2: Often;3=3: Frequently;4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI4: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF8B character 8b. Severity Ratings

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 1=1: Mild; 2=2: Moderate; 3=3: Marked

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Mild;2=2: Moderate;3=3: Marked

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIF8C character 8c. Caregiver Distress

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=Not at all; 1=Minimally; 2=Mildly; 3=Moderately; 4=Severely; 5=Very severely or extremely

    • ADNI3: 0=Not at all;1=Minimally;2=Mildly;3=Moderately;4=Severely;5=Very severely or extremely

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIFTOT numeric F. Elation/Euphoria: Item score

    • ADNI2, ADNI3: 0..12

    • ADNI4

  • NPIG character G. Apathy/Indifference

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIG1 character 1. Does P seem less spontaneous and less active than usual?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIG2 character 2. Is P less likely to initiate a conversation?

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIG3 character 3. Is P less affectionate or lacking in emotions when compared to his/her usual self?

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

  • NPIG5 character 5. Does P seem less interested in the activities and plans of others?

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIG6 character 6. Has P lost interest in friends and family members?

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIG7 character 7. Is P less enthusiastic about his/her usual interests?

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIG8 character 8. Does P show any other signs that he/she doesn't care about doing new things?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIG9A character 9a. Frequency Ratings

    • ADNI2: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Occasionally;2=2: Often;3=3: Frequently;4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI4: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIG9B character 9b. Severity Ratings

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 1=1: Mild; 2=2: Moderate; 3=3: Marked

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Mild;2=2: Moderate;3=3: Marked

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIG9C character 9c. Caregiver Distress

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=Not at all; 1=Minimally; 2=Mildly; 3=Moderately; 4=Severely; 5=Very severely or extremely

    • ADNI3: 0=Not at all;1=Minimally;2=Mildly;3=Moderately;4=Severely;5=Very severely or extremely

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIGTOT numeric G. Apathy/Indifference: Item score

    • ADNI2, ADNI3: 0..12

    • ADNI4

  • NPIH character H. Disinhibition

    • ADNI2, ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIH1 character 1. Does P act impulsively without appearing to consider the consequences?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIH2 character 2. Does P talk to total strangers as if he/she knew them?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIH3 character 3. Does P say things to people that are insensitive or hurt their feelings?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIH4 character 4. Does P say crude things or make sexual remarks that they would not usually have said?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIH5 character 5. Does P talk openly about very personal or private matters not usually discussed in public?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • NPIH6 character 6. Does P take liberties or touch or hug others in a way that is out of character for him/her?

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes; 0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

    • ADNI3: 1=1: Occasionally;2=2: Often;3=3: Frequently;4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI4: 1=1: Occasionally; 2=2: Often; 3=3: Frequently; 4=4: Very frequently

    • ADNI3: 0=Not at all;1=Minimally;2=Mildly;3=Moderately;4=Severely;5=Very severely or extremely

  • SITEID numeric Site ID Range value: 1, ..., 941

  • USERDATE User Create Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • USERDATE2 User Last Modify Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • DD_CRF_VERSION_LABEL character CRF Version Label , with options: v1

  • LANGUAGE_CODE character Language Code e=English Decoded Value: Yes

  • HAS_QC_ERROR character Has Quality Check Error 0=Does not have QC error or QC error has been approved; 1=Has QC error Decoded Value: Yes
